Articles.Content:
So I just got change from a store and their was a Euro coin in my change...

I just want to know this cause I\'m starting a savings account...

So I just got change from a store and their was a Euro coin in my change...

I just want to know this cause I\'m starting a savings account...

Odds are, if they do, they\'ll take it at face value, but don\'t count on it being accepted everywhere.
